entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING NORTHEAST THIS AFTERNOON

A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT

NORTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

NORTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING SOUTHWEST AFTER MIDNIGHT

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
